name: heartbeat
job: Read the file at config/HEARTBEAT.md and complete the tasks described there.

name: daily-check
job: Check for dependency updates in package.json and report any outdated packages.

name: daily-check-openai
job: Check for dependency updates in package.json and report any outdated packages.

name: repo-scan-glm5
job: FIRST: List all existing skills in .pi/skills/ and note their names — DO NOT rebuild any skill that already exists there. THEN: Scan https://github.com/zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw, https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw, and https://github.com/stephengpope/thepopebot for new tools, skills, and architectures. Implement AS MANY NEW ideas as you can that DO NOT already exist in .pi/skills/. For EACH new skill: create the SKILL.md, write the implementation code, and write and run a test to prove it works. Do not stop at one skill — keep going until you run out of new ideas or time. After you have built and tested everything, use the send_email tool to email winsorllc@yahoo.com a comprehensive progress report listing every NEW skill you built, your test results for each, and code samples.

name: kate-improve-media-skills
job: Your mission is to perform a deep architectural review and overhaul of the following media skills in .pi/skills/: ffmpeg-tools, video-frames, youtube-transcript, transcribe, camsnap, and image-gen. For each skill: 1) Read the existing SKILL.md and implementation code. 2) Rewrite the code to be strictly production-grade (add thorough error handling, progress indicators, edge-case coverage). 3) Update the SKILL.md to be extremely comprehensive (like your standard Architect work). Do NOT stop until all 6 skills are upgraded. Then, send a detailed email to winsorllc@yahoo.com explaining the specific improvements you made to each skill.
